extensionContent.name: KIELER Overview
extensionContent.text: The KIELER project aims at enhancing the pragmatics of graphical model-based system design, i.e. the way the user works with graphical models. Basic goals are to improve editing and analysis of complex models while increasing productivity.
You can experience the new features which are tightly integrated into the Eclipse IDE.
Check the New-Wizards "KIELER" category for example graphical diagram editor.
Check the "KIELER" menubar, toolbar buttons and context menu group for actions contributed by KIELER
Check the preferences to customize your KIELER settings, e.g. for automatic layout.
